archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: PAC Indicium Solutions
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
For Mexico only, the provider is Indicium Solutions https://www.indiciumsolutions.com.mx/
PAC means Electronic Invoice Authorized Certification Provider (Proveedor Autorizado de Certificaci贸n de Factura Electr贸nica), is an organization with SAT (Servicio de Administraci贸n Tributaria) authorization to validate, assign a fiscal folio and put a SAT's digital stamp on invoices.
